articles.title: Key takeaways from UN court’s ruling on South Africa’s case against Israel’s war in Gaza - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: The United Nations' world court on Friday came down hard on Israel’s war on Hamas in Gaza, calling on Israel to “take all measures” to prevent a genocide of the Palestinians. But it stopped short of demanding an immediate cease-fire.
